error.noAvailablePort: No available port: tried {maxAttempts} ports from {startPort}, all in use
error.fetchHmrClientFailed: Failed to fetch HMR client script: {status} {statusText} ({url})

hmr.compileClientScriptFailed: Failed to compile HMR client script: {message}

server.portInUse: Port {port} is in use, using port {actualPort}

http.gracefulShutdownTimeoutPending: Graceful shutdown timeout, {count} request(s) still pending
http.serverShuttingDownReject: Server is shutting down, rejecting new requests
http.pathHandlerNoMatch: Path handler prefix={prefix} pathname={pathname} → no match
http.pathHandlerTookOver: Taken over by path handler: {prefix} status: {status}
http.middlewareChainDoneNoRoute: Middleware chain done response status: {status} (no route match 404)
http.gracefulShutdownTimeoutForce: Graceful shutdown timeout, forcing server close
